text.headline: My Internship Timeline
text.text: Visual display of my schedule and progress

media.caption: A Naive Project Attempting to Understand AI-related Concepts (link)

text.headline: Learning AI-related Conecpts
text.text: I used online course from FastAi (credits), where I learned about basic concepts in AI such as models, transformers, tokenizer, embedding, etc., through building a demo project (link).

media.caption: Tools used in research and designing, links in reference setion

text.headline: Research and Solution Desigin before Coding
text.text: In order to meet the requirements and regulations, I resort to OSS models and frameworks for building a solution that will run on our on-premise machine. Through trial and error, the best OSS Text-to-SQL model is defog/SQLCoder (credits), where I successfully run their demo on google Colab to get preliminary results.

text.headline: Coding
text.text: I use Python and Jupyter Notebook as my local environment, following both guidance and best practices from langchain. Through extensive source code reading and customizing, I found SQLDatabaseChain in langchain library best suits our requirements.

media.caption: Langchain Coding Improvemnet and SQLCoder integration

text.headline: More Coding
text.text: I use streamlit as my interface, and wrote integration code to put all things together. Through more coding I found more improvment methods, which I don't have enough time to integrate, and I will introduce them in the following section.
